title: Cranberry upside down cake
ingredients: ['For the topping', '200g soft brown sugar', '300g fresh cranberries', 'For the cake', '110g butter', '180g soft brown sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150ml milk', 'zest of 1 lemon', '240g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
